name: test_03
description: Disconnecting a Receiver from a connected Flow via IS-05
question:
Use the NCuT to remove the connection between sender: 

s5/andrews (Mock sender 5, f03fb351-bb39-470e-8150-dbea75170eee) 

and receiver: 

r4/harrison (Mock receiver 4, 6364c8b8-0595-40d9-93fa-4619431b3b84) 

Click the 'Next' button once the connection has been removed.
